Hollywood Story (1951)
sources.description: Richard Conte, Julie Adams, Richard Egan, Henry Hull, Fred Clark, Jim Backus, Paul Cavanagh, Francis X. Bushman, Betty Blythe, William Farnum, Elmo Lincoln, Joel McCrea

sources.title: Hollywood Story (1951)
sources.description: A producer takes over a small film studio and - sensing that it'll be a good movie- begins investigating an old murder of a silent film director shot in his office years ago. He finds that his life is threatened as he digs deeper into the mystery. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/hollywood-story-1951/

metadata.Plot: Hollywood 1950: The successful producer Larry O'Brian arrives in Los Angeles to found a motion picture company. He buys an old studio which was unused since the days of silent movies. He's shown the office where the famous director Franklin Farrara was shot. The case hasn't been solved until now, although there were many suspects. O'Brian becomes fascinated by the subject and wants to shoot a movie about it. He investigates himself and soon gets into danger himself.
metadata.Actors: Richard Conte, Julie Adams, Richard Egan
